choices.choiceText: Sorry, i'm a little slow in the head. Hello Zozk!

nodes.text: Haha!
Haha! you're such a jokester!
Don't be sorry, It's fun!
*Zozk looks a little sad*
It's nothing...

choices.choiceText: Oh, well in that case *walk away*
I can tell something is bothering you

nodes.text: Well...my charger is gone

choices.choiceText: Where did you see it last?

nodes.text: wow...calm down
He said he would transform it so it could take power over ethernet

choices.choiceText: Oh! well he's doing you a favor

nodes.text: Well...

nodes.text: ok...but i need it fo-

choices.choiceText: It allows both data and power to be delivered through a single cable

nodes.text: fair, but...

nodes.text: ok...

nodes.text: Would you please? But don't mention me, I don't want him to get mad
No, I keep asking but he just says he'll give it back soon. It has been days

choices.choiceText: I'll go and have a look
Have some patience, it's only been a few days

nodes.text: Actually... Viktor took it.

nodes.text: okay then...

nodes.text: *Sigh*
No worries

nodes.text: Oh good, no confrontation, the best of both world
OMG! Are you also a fan!

nodes.text: You get the best of both worlds! Chillin' out, take it slow, Then you rock out the show!

choices.choiceText: Just kidding, it was i Javads classroom

Oh god, oh no. I hope he doesn't get mad

nodes.text: My hero!
Now that i have my charger i can finally continue working on my website.
...ok...I think i'm gonna focus on this website now
It's my own bussiness idea, it's gonna make me rich
Design your own beutifull website with squarespace
With easy to use, drag and drop, templates, you'll have a website up and running in 10 minutes
Sign up today with the code "ITGSIM" to get 10% of your next one year plan on squarespace
Now, back to the game
Yes! This portion of the game is sponsored by squarespace
It's a website where you can make websites
Well have you ever heard of the gold rush?
The gold rush was a period of time when everyone tried to dig for gold or something

choices.choiceText: What does this have to do with your website?

nodes.text: Well, the ones that made money in the gold rush was not the people digging for gold, but the people who sold the shovels
Yes exactly!
The internet is the new gold, and everyone wants to be on it to make money, so I'll provide them with the "shovels"
But i'm having a little bit of a problem.

choices.choiceText: I don't want to hear about your problems, bye

nodes.text: I've desgined this beutifull landing page, but people can't see it for some reason
I've asked people to go to my website, but they say they can't see anything and then they laugh at me

choices.choiceText: Do you want me to help troubleshoot?
I'm no good with the computer stuff, good luck with that, bye

nodes.text: If you want, I'd appreciate it

choices.choiceText: What's the adress of your website?

nodes.text: www.C:\Users\Zozk\Documents\Websites\CirclePlace\CirclePlace.txt.html.com

nodes.text: Find anything?

nodes.text: Thanks for trying
no no, this is my first website, there is no sequel

Oh nothing, i'm just trying to get this sticker of my laptop

choices.choiceText: *He looks busy, i should leave him alone*
Hey, what are you up to?

choices.choiceText: I bet you looked cute on the picture
Well that sounds nice, maybe you should appreciate that someone took the time to make that

nodes.text: haha thanks

nodes.text: Some people like to put me in stuff they make...

choices.choiceText: Oh, I bet they just like you

nodes.text: Yeah maybe, it doesn't always feel like that tho

choices.choiceText: I get where you're coming from

nodes.text: alright then...

No worries

nodes.text: haha...Just kidding...ehm...gotta go

choices.choiceText: Only because you make it easy.
